name: yatra-automation
description: Enterprise-grade Playwright Automation Framework for Yatra UI Testing

scripts.clean: rimraf allure-results allure-report reports test-results playwright-report
scripts.test:dev: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=dev npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=list,allure-playwright
scripts.test:qa: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=list,allure-playwright
scripts.test:prod: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=prod npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=list,allure-playwright
scripts.test:headed: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test --headed --project=chromium
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test:parallel: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test --workers=4 --reporter=list,allure-playwright
scripts.test:smoke: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test tests/smoke --project=chromium --reporter=list,allure-playwright
scripts.report:allure: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run test:qa && npm run report:allure
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci:test: npm run clean && ts-node utils/allureEnvWriter.ts && cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx playwright test --reporter=list,line,allure-playwright --workers=2
scripts.ci:report: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && echo '✅ Allure report generated for CI/CD pipeline'
